Method.name: ParseClonesHistory
Method.Description: Extract date and amount of views {"counts":[{"bucket":1451174400,"total":1,"unique":1}...{"bucket":1450051200,"total":0,"unique":0}],"summary":{"total":5,"unique":5}}
Method.Implementation:
s pos = $f(html,"bucket"":"), num = 0, pos = 1 while $f(html,"bucket"":",pos){ s num = num + 1 s pos = $f(html,"bucket"":",pos), end = $f(html,",",pos)-($l(",")+1) s data(num,"date") = $e(html,pos,end) s pos = $f(html,"total"":",pos), end = $f(html,",",pos)-($l(",")+1) s data(num,"amount") = $e(html,pos,end) }
Q 1

Method.name: Insert
